text: Hi Guys, we've had a strange occurrence and was wondering if anyone has had something similar happen. We have been working on a custom coded action for a workflow for the last week. When we opened it this morning the code had vanished from the action. All the revision history is also blank when we open it. I would love to get some opinions on this. Thanks in advance.

Hi folks,

does anyone knows how to check visitor response contains space (" ")  in the HubSpot chat conversation flow.?

I tried this condition in the if/then condition  (" "), but it does not work. please share your response here if anyone has an idea..

Note: I am checking the contact's full name as the response  (first name and last name) for calendar booking...

We are looking to set some properties on tickets from their associated company's properties. What's the best way of doing this for each ticket when it is created? Am I wrong in thinking that I might need to get that information via an API call? I can't see a way of getting associated object's values in the workflow.
Thanks for the heads up, weâ€™re investigating and will let you know once we have an update!
Everything should be back on line now~
Please let us know if you continue to run into any issues!
